metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, London Town is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: London Town has sections analyzed in the following keys: D Major, A Major,  and E Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
